lines.content: Ensure you have JDK 11 installed on your device.
`list`: Lists all tasks in the task list.
`todo [task]`: Adds a task to the list.
`mark [task number]`: Marks a task as done.
`delete [task number]`: Removes a task from the list.
Lists all tasks currently in the task list.
Here are the tasks in your list:

Marks a task as undone based on its number in the task list.
Ok, I've marked this task as not done yet:
Saves the task list to a file called Duke.txt from the data folder.
Your tasks have been saved successfully.
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
* Handles writing of the user's task list to Duke.txt.
* Saves the task list to Duke.txt in the data folder.
* Throws when the user inputs a command that involves a task with an undefined or invalid date/time.
+ "OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but the date and/or time cannot be empty :-(" + "\n"
* Throws when the user inputs a command that involves a task with an undefined or invalid task description.
+ "OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but the description of your task cannot be empty :-(" + "\n"
* Throws when the user inputs a command that involves a task with an undefined or invalid task number.
+ "OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but your task number is invalid :-(" + "\n"
* Throws when the user inputs a command that is not recognised by Duke.
+ "OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(" + "\n"
